column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I've had steaks in many Chicago steakhouses (e.g. David Burke's
column3: Cut) and the filet at Bavette's was by far the best I've had.  Complement the dish with a side of their elote corn (a bit spicy if you can't handle the heat) and an Old Fashioned
column4: and you'll be in heaven.  Conclude the feast with the golden brick dessert and you won't be disappointed.
